original_text: And Jesus went on with his disciples to the villages of Caesarea Philippi. And on the way he asked his disciples, “Who do people say that I am?”
korean_text: 예수와 제자들이 빌립보 가이사랴 여러 마을로 나가실새 길에서 제자들에게 물어 이르시되 사람들이 나를 누구라고 하느냐

sentences.original_text: And Jesus went on with his disciples
to the villages of Caesarea Philippi.
And on the way he asked his disciples
“Who do people say that I am?”
